purpose: To provide a comprehensive toolkit for AI agents to perform financial operations, including blockchain and cryptocurrency management
principle: Built on a modular architecture leveraging TypeScript, enabling integration with various blockchain technologies and AI frameworks
reusability: Offers a set of APIs and SDKs for easy integration into AI-driven financial applications, supporting modular and extensible development
limitations: Primarily focused on crypto and blockchain, may not cover traditional financial operations comprehensively
name: goat
description: The leading agentic finance toolkit for AI agents
highlight: Facilitates AI-driven financial operations with blockchain and crypto integrations
